document.full_text: the ncaa will re-examine its role in licensing bowls and has put a three-year hold on any new games in the wake of the fiesta bowl's problems.
document.title: new task force to review bowl licensing procedures
lines_and_colors: the ncaa will re-examine its role in licensing bowls and has put a three-year hold on any new games in the wake of the fiesta bowl's problems.
